QueryDataSource.Name: dgvZYFee
QueryDataSource.Sql: select d.dept_name 科室名称,sum(hj) 合计,sum(ca) 现金,sum(cd) 信用卡,sum(ch) 旧门诊套餐,sum(ci) 商保记账,sum(de) 套餐押金, sum(po) 转账,sum(pr) 套餐实收,sum(pyzz) 套餐宰账,sum(pos) POS,sum(wp) 微信,sum(ye) 应收其他,sum(ys) 账户支付,sum(zb) 支付宝 from ( select m.dept_code,fb.invoice_no,(select nvl(sum(a.cost),0) from fin_ipb_balancepay a where a.invoice_no = fb.invoice_no and a.trans_type = fb.trans_type and a.PAY_WAY not in ('DC','PD','PY','RC') ) hj, (select nvl(sum(a.cost),0) from fin_ipb_balancepay a where a.invoice_no = fb.invoice_no and a.trans_type = fb.trans_type and a.PAY_WAY = 'CA') ca, (select nvl(sum(a.COST),0) from fin_ipb_balancepay a where a.invoice_no = fb.invoice_no and a.trans_type = fb.trans_type and a.PAY_WAY = 'CD') cd, (select nvl(sum(a.COST),0) from fin_ipb_balancepay a where a.invoice_no = fb.invoice_no and a.trans_type = fb.trans_type and a.PAY_WAY = 'CH') ch, (select nvl(sum(a.COST),0) from fin_ipb_balancepay a where a.invoice_no = fb.invoice_no and a.trans_type = fb.trans_type and a.PAY_WAY = 'CI') ci, (select nvl(sum(a.COST),0) from fin_ipb_balancepay a where a.invoice_no = fb.invoice_no and a.trans_type = fb.trans_type and a.PAY_WAY = 'DC') dc, (select nvl(sum(a.COST),0) from fin_ipb_balancepay a where a.invoice_no = fb.invoice_no and a.trans_type = fb.trans_type and a.PAY_WAY = 'DE') de, (select nvl(sum(a.COST),0) from fin_ipb_balancepay a where a.invoice_no = fb.invoice_no and a.trans_type = fb.trans_type and a.PAY_WAY = 'PD') PD, (select nvl(sum(a.COST),0) from fin_ipb_balancepay a where a.invoice_no = fb.invoice_no and a.trans_type = fb.trans_type and a.PAY_WAY = 'PO') po, (select nvl(sum(a.COST),0) from fin_ipb_balancepay a where a.invoice_no = fb.invoice_no and a.trans_type = fb.trans_type and a.PAY_WAY = 'PR') pr, (select nvl(sum(a.COST),0) from fin_ipb_balancepay a where a.invoice_no = fb.invoice_no and a.trans_type = fb.trans_type and a.PAY_WAY = 'PY') py, (select nvl(sum(a.COST),0) from fin_ipb_balancepay a where a.invoice_no = fb.invoice_no and a.trans_type = fb.trans_type and a.PAY_WAY = 'PYZZ') pyzz, (select nvl(sum(a.COST),0) from fin_ipb_balancepay a where a.invoice_no = fb.invoice_no and a.trans_type = fb.trans_type and a.PAY_WAY = 'RC') rc, (select nvl(sum(a.COST),0) from fin_ipb_balancepay a where a.invoice_no = fb.invoice_no and a.trans_type = fb.trans_type and a.PAY_WAY = 'UP') pos, (select nvl(sum(a.COST),0) from fin_ipb_balancepay a where a.invoice_no = fb.invoice_no and a.trans_type = fb.trans_type and a.PAY_WAY = 'WP') WP, (select nvl(sum(a.COST),0) from fin_ipb_balancepay a where a.invoice_no = fb.invoice_no and a.trans_type = fb.trans_type and a.PAY_WAY = 'YE') ye, (select nvl(sum(a.COST),0) from fin_ipb_balancepay a where a.invoice_no = fb.invoice_no and a.trans_type = fb.trans_type and a.PAY_WAY = 'YS') ys, (select nvl(sum(a.COST),0) from fin_ipb_balancepay a where a.invoice_no = fb.invoice_no and a.trans_type = fb.trans_type and a.PAY_WAY = 'ZB') zb from fin_ipr_inmaininfo m inner join FIN_IPB_BALANCEHEAD fb on m.inpatient_no=fb.inpatient_no where fb.DAYBALANCE_DATE between to_date('&startDate','yyyy-MM-dd') and to_date('&endDate','yyyy-MM-dd')+1 ) t left join com_department d on d.dept_code=t.dept_code group by t.dept_code,d.dept_name order by d.dept_name

ReportQueryInfo.QueryFilePath: Report\门诊财务报表\爱博恩\\住院费用按支付方式科室统计数据设置.xml
